author: Grace Tsai
description: Rich and cinnamon spiced with chocolatey raisin, this stirred spirituous cocktail is a great after dinner cocktail.
name: Apóstol
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Dark crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: FLAME cinnamon powder on a suitable surface and upend snifter glass over smoking cinnamon and leave to capture smoke while mixing ingredients
STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into cinnamon smoked glass
